The tail lights of the car in the image are sleek and modern, with a deep red hue that contrasts sharply against the orange body of the vehicle. They have a smooth, curved design that follows the contours of the rear fender, giving them a streamlined appearance. The taillights are rectangular in shape, with a subtle gradient effect that enhances their three-dimensional look.

The rear bumper is wide and low, contributing to the car's sporty aesthetic. It features two circular exhaust outlets on either side, which are chrome-finished and add a touch of elegance. The bumper itself has a matte black finish, which complements the vibrant orange paint of the car. The license plate is mounted centrally on the rear bumper, and it appears to be a standard California license plate with a white background and blue lettering.

Overall, the combination of the red taillights, the black bumper, and the orange body creates a visually striking contrast, making the car stand out as a high-performance sports car. The design elements are both functional and stylish, emphasizing the car's performance-oriented nature.
